subject: World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Everyone seems to be reassessing their opinions of Ronaldo,  the Brazilian forward, who has become the World Cup's leading career scorer with 15 goals as Brazil has advanced to play France in the quarterfinals.
snippet: Everyone seems to be reassessing their opinions of Ronaldo,  the Brazilian forward, who has become the World Cup's leading career scorer with 15 goals as Brazil has advanced to play France in the quarterfinals.
